# LightMode

In some occasions, you might want Chakra components to look the same in both light and dark modes.
To achieve this, wrap the component in a `LightMode` or `DarkMode` component. Doing this will
override the global `colorMode`.

## Import

```jsx live=false
import { LightMode } from '@totejs/uikit';
```

## Usage

```jsx
function Example() {
  const { colorMode, toggleColorMode } = useColorMode();

  return (
    <VStack alignItems="flex-start">
      <Button size="sm" onClick={toggleColorMode}>
        Toggle Mode
      </Button>

      <Divider />

      <HStack>
        <LightMode>
          <Button size="sm" colorScheme="warning">
            Light Mode Always
          </Button>
          <Text>Some text</Text>
        </LightMode>
      </HStack>

      <Divider />

      <HStack>
        <DarkMode>
          <Button size="sm" colorScheme="danger">
            Dark Mode Always
          </Button>
          <Text>Some text</Text>
        </DarkMode>
      </HStack>
    </VStack>
  );
}
```
